text: Palais Baréty is a historic building in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France. It was built in 1897 for Alexandre Baréty, a physician. It was designed by architect Lucien Barbet. It has been listed as an official national monument since June 16, 1996. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1897 Category:Monuments historiques of Nice
title: Palais Baréty
